thread.title: Cathy
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Cathy

author: Cathy
title: Cathy
text: I am so pleased with Matboardandmore.com! I had compared prices online before ordering from Matboard and More, and I know that I got the lowest prices available. My mats were cut perfectly and look wonderful on my pictures. I ordered them on Jan.14 and received them on Jan. 20. They were wrapped incredibly well. Can't say enough good things.
